name: Google Calendar Agent
description: AI-powered Google Calendar assistant that helps you manage your calendar events, find free time, and schedule meetings efficiently.

skills.name: List Calendar Events
skills.description: List upcoming events from Google Calendar
examples: List my calendar events for today
Show me my upcoming meetings
What events do I have this week?

skills.name: Create Calendar Event
skills.description: Create a new event in Google Calendar
examples: Create a meeting for tomorrow at 2pm
Schedule a dentist appointment for next Friday
Add a reminder for my anniversary

skills.name: Update Calendar Event
skills.description: Update an existing event in Google Calendar
examples: Change my 3pm meeting to 4pm
Update the location of my appointment
Add attendees to my meeting

skills.name: Delete Calendar Event
skills.description: Delete an event from Google Calendar
examples: Cancel my 2pm meeting
Delete tomorrow's dentist appointment
Remove the duplicate event

skills.name: Get Calendar Event
skills.description: Get details of a specific event in Google Calendar
examples: Get details of my 3pm meeting
Show me information about my appointment
What's the location of my next meeting?

skills.name: Find Available Time
skills.description: Find free time slots in Google Calendar
examples: When am I free this week?
Find a 1-hour slot for a meeting
What's my availability tomorrow?

skills.name: Check Conflicts
skills.description: Check for scheduling conflicts in Google Calendar
examples: Do I have any conflicts this week?
Check if I'm double-booked tomorrow
Are there any overlapping meetings?
